basics.name: Ryosuke Tanno
basics.label: Research Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer specializing in developing web applications and core machine learning algorithms. My research interests lie in the fields of Computer Vision and Machine Learning, with a particular focus on Multi-modal Deep Learning.

work.name: NTT Communications Corporation
work.position: Advanced Specialist / Software Engineer Research Development
work.summary: research and development of time-series data analysis web applications, multi-modal deep learning, and AI talent development.
